      • createUser

        public cgg.informatique.jfl.labo10.modeles.Token createUser(java.lang.String pAlias,
                                                            java.lang.String pCourriel,
                                                            java.lang.String pPasword,
                                                            int pIdAvatar)
        Create an user To be valid :
        • User's param must respect policy
        • Email must be available
        • Alias must be available
        • Avatar must exist
        Parameters:
        pAlias - The displayed name of the user (NickName)
        pCourriel - The E-mail of the user
        pPasword - The pasword (MD5 encrypted ) of the user.
        pIdAvatar - The ID of the selected Avatar.
        Returns:
        token

                                                              java.lang.String pCaptcha)
        Activate an user
        • Token and User must exist
        • captcha must match.
        Parameters:
        pIdToken - The ID of the token that requested action
        pCaptcha - The value of the captcha.
        Returns:
        token
